label: Label
name: Name
is_template_new_panel: Is panel a template for private dashboards view (Can't be changed later)

properties.legend_description: Set legends's visibility in the tile's chart
properties.measurement_list_description: Set measurements list visibility e.g. in knob tile or doughnut tiles
properties.measurement_background_description: Use measurement's defined background (if it's defined, and tile's mask is undefined ) as tile's background
properties.background_mask_description: Tile's background mask (hex color) - background with transparency , where transparency value is dependant to the measurment value (only single tile measurements)
properties.background_description: Tile's default background, 'none'(inherits from panel) if not defined
properties.template_description: Use tile's text predefined template to present the value
properties.knob_color_description: Hex color of the knob tile component (rangeColor).
properties.qrcode_content_description: Text which will be encoded into QR code graphics
